body: Spent the weekend #camping in the #mountains. Best way to disconnect and recharge! #outdoorlife #naturelover

comments.body: That looks so peaceful! Did you hike to the campsite?
@89898 Yup! It was about a 3-mile hike to get there, but totally worth it for the view and the solitude.
Wow, those mountains look amazing! How was the weather?
@90909 The weather was perfect! Sunny during the day and cool at night. Ideal for sitting around the campfire.
What’s the best part of camping for you? I’ve been thinking about trying it, but I’m not sure where to start.
@10101 Honestly, just disconnecting from everything. No phones, no distractions—just nature. You should definitely try it!
Did you see any wildlife while you were out there?
@23232 A few deer and lots of birds! No bears, thankfully!
What did you cook over the campfire? Always curious about camp meals!
@34343 Classic s’mores, of course! And some foil-wrapped veggies and sausages for dinner. Simple but delicious!
